system.description: A holy symbol of the Ecclesiarchy that contains a powerful conversion field generator with a protection rating of 50. Allies with line of sight gain +10 to Fear and Pinning tests; this bonus is lost if the wearer dies or takes Critical damage. Only usable by Adeptus Ministorum, Adepta Sororitas, or Inquisitor elite advance characters.

Creates a linear force field between generators, 1.5m high and up to 8m long. Acts as cover with a protection rating of 65; only body parts behind the wall gain protection. If a section overloads, only that portion shuts down.

An armour upgrade. When an enemy melee attack roll ends in 1, the attacker's weapon is destroyed (unless it has the Power Field, Warp Weapon quality, or is otherwise immune). Imposes a -5 penalty to Max Agility. Adds 4kg to armour weight.
An armour upgrade for power armour only. Grants +5 BS bonus and +10 to Awareness tests (Sight and Hearing). Requires a helmet. Adds 2kg to armour weight.

A sacred brazier that can be mounted on armour, a helmet, or a backpack. Half Action to light; burns for 2 hours. Acts as a glow-globe and grants +30 to Charm and Command tests, +10 to Intimidate tests, but imposes -40 to Stealth tests. If the wearer is knocked Prone while lit, they must pass an Ordinary Agility test or catch fire.
An armour upgrade for carapace and power armour only. Grants +3 AP against Flame, Melta, and heat-based attacks. Adds 2kg to armour weight.
An armour upgrade. Grants +10 to Command tests against Imperial faithful, but imposes -10 to Fellowship tests against non-Imperial-loyal characters. Adds 1kg to armour weight.

An armour upgrade for carapace and power armour only. Grants +20 to resist psychic attacks and manipulation. Armour points are doubled against psychic attack hits. The Warp Weapon quality does NOT ignore this armour's AP.
A grenade that releases hallucinogenic chemicals over a wide area. Targets within the Blast (3) radius must resist Hallucinogenic (4) effects. Range SBx3.
A rare grenade containing anti-psychic compounds. Deals 1d10 Explosive damage with Blast (3). Also creates a Smoke (3) cloud. Particularly effective against psykers and daemons. Range SBx3.
A grenade that releases a burst of lethal radiation. Deals 1d10 Energy damage with Blast (2). Targets may suffer lingering radiation effects. Range SBx3.
A biological weapon that releases a cloud of choking spores over a large area with Blast (5). Does not deal direct damage but can incapacitate targets within the cloud. Range SBx3.

An extremely rare holy grenade said to contain the crystallised tears of a martyred saint. Deals 1d10 Explosive damage with Blast (2) and the Sanctified quality. Particularly devastating against daemonic and Warp-touched entities. Range SBx3.
An incendiary grenade that releases a blinding white phosphorus-like substance. Deals 1d10+4 Explosive damage with Pen 3, Blast (3), Corrosive, Flame, Smoke (5), and Toxic (2) qualities. Range SBx3.
